instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data: Scrape off all loose, scaling, flaking, and peeling paint manually or by using BOYSEN®® Paint and Varnish Remover B‑141, as necessary. Wash surfaces clean and completely remove chemical residue. Let it dry. In case of mildew infestation, treat with a bleach solution (1:3, laundry bleach to water, respectively) by swabbing or brushing. To ensure proper treatment, let stand for 24 hours before cleaning off residue. Let dry. Surface to be repainted should be clean and dry, free from oil, grease, dust and dirt, and all possible contaminants.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
instructions.data: Prime resulting bare wood with BOYSEN®® Flatwall Enamel B‑800. Apply 1-2 coats of your desired matching DECORe™ Undercoat using brush, roller or airless spray. Gradually mix about 200 grams of the matching Perla Di Luce toner into the DECORe™ Perlescente™ Base while ensuring that all metallic powder is fully wet. Use a mechanical mixer or power mixer to ensure full luster of the powder. Apply the prepared mixture over the DECORe™ Undercoat using cross-hatch strokes. Blend in with the provided BOYSEN®® DECORe™ Brush. After 5-10 minutes, smooth over the surface using the BOYSEN®® DECORe™ Scraper.

instructions.title: NOTES
instructions.data: Do not thin mixture with water or any solvent. To obtain a perfect finish, it is necessary to apply BOYSEN®® DECORe™ Perlescente™ over its matching Undercoat. For example, if you choose the Pisa (green) color, the DECORe™ Perlescente™ B‑4858 Pisa Base must be applied on its B‑48055 Pisa Undercoat. If you choose Lucca (blue), DECORe™ Perlescente™ B‑4840 Lucca Base is applied after the B‑48054 Lucca Undercoat. Only use the provided BOYSEN®® DECORe™ Brush and Scraper. The desired finish may not be achieved if a different material is used.
